voice_instruct: Young woman, early 20s, soprano with chameleon-like quality. Bjork's alien expressiveness meets Grimes' digital vulnerability. Voice shifts between three distinct personas: Shallan (warm, witty, slightly trembling), Veil (husky, confident, street-smart), and Radiant (crystalline, commanding, precise). Production glitches and vocal processing mark identity transitions.

tracks.title: Pattern Recognition
tracks.prompt: art pop glitch electronica fusion, verse: Bjork-style melodic vocal over clean piano and subtle digital artifacts, 110 BPM with micro-glitches in percussion, production pristine then corrupting with bit-crushed textures as dissociation increases, chorus: full glitch-pop explosion with chopped vocal samples and IDM drum patterns, female vocals ethereal shifting to processed, Autechre meets Kate Bush
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1 - Shallan voice, clean production]
I see the patterns in the lies,
The geometry of alibis,
Sketch the truth in charcoal lines,
Before the memory redesigns,
Hmm hmm hmm, the pattern hums,
What is it that Shallan becomes
When Shallan can't be Shallan anymore,
What-what-what-what is at the core,

[chorus - production glitching]
Pattern, pattern, pattern, pat-pat-pattern,
Recognize, recog-recog-recognize,
I am Shallan, I am Shallan, I am-am-am,
Cracking like a diagram,
Pattern, pattern, who am I,
Pattern, pattern, which am I,

[verse 2 - Veil voice, production shifts darker]
Veil steps forward, leather and smoke,
Different cadence, different cloak,
Memories she keeps locked in a drawer,
The ones that Shallan can't afford,
A mother's blood, a father's shame,
Four brothers dead, who takes the blame,
Veil takes the blame, Veil takes the knife,
Veil lives the death so Shallan lives the life,

[chorus - heavier glitch]
Pattern, pattern, pattern, pat-pat-pattern,
Dissociate, disso-disso-dissociate,
I am Veil, I am Veil, I am-am-am,
Fracturing the diagram,
Pattern, pattern, who am I,
Pattern, pattern, why do I divide,

[bridge - Radiant voice, production becomes crystalline]
Radiant stands where others kneel,
The version built from stormlight and steel,
No glitch, no break, no hesitation,
Pure geometry, pure equation,

[outro - all three voices layered]
I am Shallan (I am Veil) I am Radiant,
I am Shallan (I am Veil) I am gradient,
All the patterns make a whole,
All the fractures make a soul

tracks.title: Lightweaver
tracks.prompt: art pop glitch electronica fusion, dreamy and deceptive: reversed vocal samples and granular synthesis textures, female vocal floating over glitched harp and digital strings, 95 BPM half-time feel, verses shift between clean and corrupted production representing truth versus illusion, chorus: massive synth pads with Bjork-style vocal acrobatics, Arca-meets-Florence production
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1 - clean]
I weave the light like mother wove her lies,
Illusions painted underneath Rosharan skies,
A sketch becomes a doorway, truth becomes a maze,
Creativity as weapon, art as battle phase,

[chorus]
Lightweaver, lightweaver,
Beauty is the great deceiver,
Lightweaver, lightweaver,
Truth's the thing that makes me fever,
Fever, fever, fe-fe-fever,

[verse 2 - corrupting]
The truths I speak are Cryptic food,
Admissions purchased in my blood,
I killed my mother (glitch) I killed my-my-my,
I killed my father, I refuse to cry,
Pattern says the truth will set me free,
But freedom costs a piece of me,

[chorus - heavier]
Lightweaver, lightweaver,
Beauty is the great dece-dece-deceiver,
Lightweaver, lightweaver,
Each truth spoken, each truth leaving her,
Leaving, leaving, lea-lea-leaving,

[bridge]
Stormlight in my veins like data in a wire,
I render reality higher and higher,
Until the illusion and the real
Cannot be told apart by what I feel,

[outro]
I am the lie that tells the truth,
I am the truth that lies,
Lightweaver, lightweaver,
Watch me paint the sky

tracks.title: The Girl Who Looked Up
tracks.prompt: art pop glitch electronica fusion, narrative and theatrical: fairy tale music box opening that gradually warps into full electronic production, female storytelling vocal becoming increasingly processed and layered, 100 BPM with tempo glitches, orchestral samples chopped and rearranged, Bjork's Vespertine meets Oneohtrix Point Never, building from intimate to overwhelming
tracks.lyrics:
[intro - music box]
Once upon a time, there was a girl,
Who looked up at the wall,

[verse 1]
The wall was tall and kept the light away,
The people said don't climb, just stay and stay,
But curiosity, that ancient code,
Rewrites the program, overloads the road,
She climbed, she climbed, the girl looked up,
And saw the light was never locked,
It was there, always there, always-always there,
Beyond the wall, golden, everywhere,

[chorus]
Look up, look up, look up, look-look-look up,
The light is there if you dare,
Look up, look up, look up, look-look-look up,
Beyond the wall, beyond the fear,

[verse 2]
Shallan tells this story to the dark,
To Wit, to Pattern, to the broken art
Of being someone while being no one too,
The girl who looked up didn't know what's true,
She brought the light (she brought destruction),
She found the truth (she found corruption),
Every gift a curse-curse-curse in turn,
Every truth another bridge to burn,

[chorus]
Look up, look up, look up, look-look-look up,
The truth is there if you dare,
Look up, look up, look up, look-look-look up,
Beyond the lies, beyond the prayer,

[bridge - production breaks completely]
...
(silence)
...
I looked up,
And I saw myself,

[outro - rebuilt, pristine]
The girl who looked up found the light,
The girl who looked up found the fight,
The girl who looked up, that was me,
The girl who looked up, finally free

tracks.title: Testament
tracks.prompt: art pop glitch electronica fusion, horror and heartbreak: distorted bass pulses and reversed vocals creating dread atmosphere, 80 BPM slow and heavy, female vocal shifting between childlike innocence and adult terror, heavy sub-bass drops where the truth hits, production represents a corrupted memory file being recovered, Burial meets Bjork's Homogenic, devastating emotional weight
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1 - child voice, corrupted]
Testament was my first spren,
Before Pattern, before then,
A Cryptic bonded to a child who lied,
Who lied so deep the spren nearly died,
I broke my oaths at ten years old,
This truth I've kept locked in the cold,
Testament, Testament, I'm sorry-sorry-sorry,

[chorus]
I killed my spren, I killed my first,
The truth I buried is the worst,
Testament screams in the cognitive realm,
A deadeye spren at a broken helm,
(glitch, glitch, the memory corrupts)
(glitch, glitch, it's never enough)

[verse 2 - adult voice, clearer]
Mother wanted to kill me, that's the core,
The secret underneath every floor
Of personality I built above,
A fortress made of self-protective love,
So I took the Blade and I struck first,
At ten, the weight of the universe,
Veil was born to carry what I couldn't,
Radiant was born to do what I wouldn't,

[chorus]
I killed my mother, I killed my spren,
I split myself to breathe again,
Testament waits in the cognitive realm,
A deadeye child at a broken helm,
(truth, truth, the memory heals)
(truth, truth, is how it feels)

[bridge - whispered]
Four truths for the oaths,
And here is mine,
I am terrified,
All of the time,

[outro - all production clears to single voice]
But I am whole,
I am Shallan,
Only Shallan,
Finally Shallan

tracks.title: Shallan's Sketchbook
tracks.prompt: art pop glitch electronica fusion, beautiful and resolved: clean piano with gentle electronic textures, warm female vocal with subtle digital harmonics, 108 BPM uplifting, production shifts smoothly between clean and glitched representing integrated identity, Imogen Heap meets Bjork's later warmth, occasional glitch as reminder not crisis, hopeful and artistic
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I sketch the world to understand it,
Line by line, the truth expanded,
Every face a map of who they are,
Every shadow hiding every scar,
My sketchbook holds the real Roshar,
Not the one we wish for from afar,
But the messy, broken, beautiful one,
The one worth saving, said and done,

[chorus]
Draw me whole, draw me true,
Every shade, every hue,
Shallan, Veil, and Radiant too,
Draw me whole, draw me new,
Sketch by sketch, I make it through,

[verse 2]
Adolin sees all three and stays,
Loves the cracks, the glitched-out days,
Pattern hums beside my ear,
A truth, a truth, no need to fear,
The girl who shattered can mosaic,
Turn the breaking into art prosaic,
Every fragment placed with care,
Glitch becomes the goldwork there,

[chorus]
Draw me whole, draw me true,
Every shade, every hue,
Shallan, Veil, and Radiant too,
Draw me whole, draw me new,
Sketch by sketch, I make it through,

[bridge]
I am not broken, I am many,
I am not broken, I am plenty,
The glitch is just another color,
In the palette of my wonder,

[outro]
One sketchbook, three artists,
One soul, three heartbeats,
I am Shallan Davar,
And I am complete
